title: How can hypnotherapy help overcome trauma and sexual anxieties?
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses how hypnosis, combined with other visualization techniques, can alleviate the trauma of sexual abuse, especially when the event occurred during childhood. They caution against interfering with the subject during spontaneous regression, a phenomenon where their subconscious regresses to the time of the traumatic event. The text then delves into how hypnotherapy can be useful in overcoming anxieties and obstacles to sexual fulfillment. The author explores various techniques, both physical and mental, that can enhance one's sexual experiences and suggests positions that can promote healing. Ultimately, the author emphasizes the importance of being honest with oneself and seeking medical help if physical problems are the cause of sexual dysfunction.
